botan.cert.x509.x509_crl

X.509 CRL

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

class X509CRLImpl: botan.cert.x509.x509_obj.X509Object;
This class represents X.509 Certificate Revocation Lists (CRLs).

class X509CRLError: object.Exception;
This class represents CRL related errors.

const bool isRevoked(in X509Certificate cert);
Check if this particular certificate is listed in the CRL

const ref const(Vector!CRLEntry) getRevoked();
Get the entries of this CRL in the form of a vector.

Returns:
vector containing the entries of this CRL.

const X509DN issuerDn();
Get the issuer DN of this CRL.

Returns:
CRLs issuer DN

const Vector!ubyte authorityKeyId();
Get the AuthorityKeyIdentifier of this CRL.

Returns:
this CRLs AuthorityKeyIdentifier

const uint crlNumber();
Get the serial number of this CRL.

Returns:
CRLs serial number

const const(X509Time) thisUpdate();
Get the CRL's thisUpdate value.

Returns:
CRLs thisUpdate

const const(X509Time) nextUpdate();
Get the CRL's nextUpdate value.

Returns:
CRLs nextdUpdate

this(DataSource input, bool throw_on_unknown_critical_ = false);
Construct a CRL from a data source.

Params:
DataSource input the data source providing the DER or PEM encoded CRL.
bool throw_on_unknown_critical_ should we throw new an exception if an unknown CRL extension marked as critical is encountered.

this(in string filename, bool throw_on_unknown_critical_ = false);
Construct a CRL from a file containing the DER or PEM encoded CRL.

Params:
string filename the name of the CRL file
bool throw_on_unknown_critical_ should we throw new an exception if an unknown CRL extension marked as critical is encountered.

this(ref const Vector!ubyte vec, bool throw_on_unknown_critical_ = false);
Construct a CRL from a binary vector

Params:
Vector!ubyte vec the binary (DER) representation of the CRL
bool throw_on_unknown_critical_ should we throw new an exception if an unknown CRL extension marked as critical is encountered.
